channel.title: Shilo OFFICIAL RELEASE - Finally, a unique server!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://forum.shilovillage.com/images/bluefox/misc/shilo_bf_logo.png[/img][/CENTER]
It is my absolute pleasure to announce the official FULL RELEASE of Shilo, the most unique server out there. ;)
[I]I'm so fucking excited.[/I]
>>> [URL=http://www.shilovillage.com/play/][COLOR=Red][SIZE=4]WEBCLIENT LINK[/SIZE][/COLOR][/URL] <<<
[URL=http://forum.shilovillage.com/][B]forums[/B][/URL] - [COLOR=Red]you must register to play[/COLOR] [URL=http://highscores.shilovillage.com/][B]highscores[/B][/URL]
I've been working on Shilo for months, and I can finally say the release is here. The full, official release. No resets. No wipes. No bullshit. This server is completely economy and player based. Completely. It's so economy based that there should even be a market for bronze, iron, and steel armor. There are no shops, minus tools being sold in the General Store and a Fishing supply store. You've got to mine your ore, smith your bars and equipment, fletch your bows and arrows, cook your food... Or buy it from someone else who already has.
[quote="Lin"]Sadly, I never played this server very much, but it was great from what I did play. I recommend it.[/quote]
Seeing as the media is pretty outdated and I really don't want to take any pictures at the moment, here's a list of the features the set Shilo apart from the rest of the servers out there.
[ul][*]Unique starting location of Shilo Village (the village is fully developed) [*]Confined server areas, limited to only areas developed -You'll always be interacting with someone else [*]Dungeons and islands to explore [*]Two FULLY CUSTOM quests (many more to come soon, I've made a simple quest system that allows me to add quests easily) - I've put a solid amount of time into these [*]Dueling anywhere - Right click, challenge, stake 'em and kill 'em [*]Challenging BOSSES - As of 7/18/12, two bosses are available: the Jungle Savage and the Black Demon [*]Monsters everywhere to train on, with working aggression and auto retaliate [*]Fully developed skill bases for every skill (as of 7/18/12, Herblore, Agility, Slayer, and Farming aren't developed yet) [list] [*]Combat is fantastic, with working melee, magic, range, and prayer [*]Mining and smithing are as good as can be [*]Woodcutting and fletching are the same [*]Fishing and cooking working perfectly as well [*]Runecrafting works perfectly, not all runes are added yet as of 7/18/12 [*]Crafting is great, with leather and green d'hide crafting currently (as of 7/18/12) [*]Thieving is working well, although currently pickpocketing of Men and Farmers is the only way to train it (as of 7/18/12) [/list] [*]Great highscores ^_^ [*]Custom locations for basically everything, ex. altars, rocks, trees, etc. [*]Lack of shops, like explained before, which will hopefully create a great economy. The goal is to have supply/demand for almost EVERYTHING, including low leveled items [*]Friendly community (of course) with carefully selected staff hehehe ^^[/ul]
[SIZE=3]Media[/SIZE] [I]Some of this media is either of unreleased content and/or changed content.[/I] [IMG]http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lopxcxYq5x1r0qwido1_1280.png[/img] [I]The house where you begin your journey.[/I]
[IMG]http://27.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lopxe7LgYq1r0qwido1_1280.png[/img] [I]The Jungle Forester's transportation system.[/I]
[IMG]http://29.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lopxfvxvIn1r0qwido1_1280.png[/img] [I]Custom underground mining site.[/I]
[IMG]http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m2hf8z96h11r0qwido1_1280.png[/img] [I]One of the many areas to explore. Watch out for the green dragons, bro![/I]
[IMG]http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m2hfng1GQ01r0qwido1_1280.png[/img] [I]The picture doesn't show much, but runecrafting is working really well.[/I]
[IMG]http://28.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m2hfq7Pr7K1r0qwido1_1280.png[/img] [I]One of the places you can go above-ground outside of Shilo Village. The Jungle Forester can take you here.[/I]
[IMG]http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m2l86dRR0z1r0qwido1_1280.png[/img] [I]Climb your way to new areas ;)[/I]
[IMG]http://29.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m2l896DoQX1r0qwido1_1280.png[/img] [I]Take a nice little raft ride to explore further into the caves. This stream/raft will take you to the underground mining site. It just teleports you, but you can imagine the ride.[/I]
[IMG]http://28.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m2l8aoEUjk1r0qwido1_1280.png[/img] [I]Explore your way to the lairs of difficult bosses.[/I]
[IMG]http://30.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m2of90orVO1r0qwido1_1280.png[/img] [I]Runecrafting isn't shown because I've already posted a picture of it and smithing/fletching aren't shown either. And obviously combat. But those are all there[/I] ;)
You guys may have been following this project or you may have even played the Alpha, but this is the real deal. You're going to have to register on the forums in order to play, and login using your forum details on the official Shilo Client.
The server is honestly fun even with a small amount of people on, but the more the merrier. Help me get the word around about Shilo. Let's make this one of the greatest servers to exist! Well, maybe that's a lot to ask, but let's make it a fun one <3

item.dc:creator: @Nebulae Nebulae
item.description:
@Nebulae wrote:

This server is really great. If you’re looking for a professional, old school server that you can progress through over the days and weeks instead of completing it and getting bored within a day, then you should definitely try this server out.

Read full topic
item.source: Shilo OFFICIAL RELEASE - Finally, a unique server!

item.title: Shilo OFFICIAL RELEASE - Finally, a unique server!
item.dc:creator: @Carter2 Carter_
item.description:
@Carter2 wrote:

10 reasons to join Shilo:

1: Truly old school
2: Developed always with a true economy in mind (steel has a market)
3: Forum/server integration
4: Professionally made. Nothing is half-arsed
5: Originality; quests have an interesting and lengthy dialogue. Not just “do this, do that”
6: Always see other players, even with a low online count. Areas released when developed/more players active
7: Not governed by corruption/immaturity. Staff is at the right ratio and not full of wannabes
8: Diversity. Thieving holds an array of items, nostalgic monsters, everyone has different equipment (not all running around in full rune/whips)
9: Seems stable. No real lag or disconnection issues
10: Exploration; looking for that feeling of adventure you once had when you first started RS back in the day? Play some nostalgia and have fun discovering

The advertisement is very underrated. The game-play truly reveals how great the server is.

Read full topic

item.title: Shilo OFFICIAL RELEASE - Finally, a unique server!
item.dc:creator: @Runite Runite
item.description:
@Runite wrote:

Loveandpower:

if anything the 10x experience rate is disappointing. low rate> high riate. no need to skill if the rates are 10x

Instead of 20 exp per hit you get 40. Instead of 125 for cutting a log you get 250… Dude I think this is one of the only servers with an experience rate that’s low like that. Minus 2006scape, but we don’t talk about that.

@dawwn: Thank you haha
